original_text: I will send a terrible illness to kill those who obey her. Then all the people in the churches will know that I look deep inside them. I know what you really want. I know what you really think. I will give each of you what is right for you, as a result of what you have done.
korean_text: 또 내가 사망으로 그의 자녀를 죽이리니 모든 교회가 나는 사람의 뜻과 마음을 살피는 자인 줄 알지라 내가 너희 각 사람의 행위대로 갚아 주리라

sentences.original_text: I will send a terrible illness
to kill those who obey her
Then all the people in the churches will know
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 모든 교회에 있는 사람들이 알 것이다

sentences.original_text: that I look deep inside them
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그들의 속 깊은 곳을 살피는 것을

sentences.original_text: I know what you really want
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너희가 정말로 원하는 것을 안다

sentences.original_text: I know what you really think
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너희가 정말로 생각하는 것을 안다

sentences.original_text: I will give each of you
as a result of what you have done
